00020 /*
00021   This file contains classes corresponding to all the window layouts
00022   defined in resources/mygui/ *.xml.
00023 
00024   Each class inherites GUI::Layout and loads the XML file, and
00025   provides some helper functions to manipulate the elements of the
00026   window.
00027 
00028   The windows are never created or destroyed (except at startup and
00029   shutdown), they are only hid. You can control visibility with
00030   setVisible().
00031  */
00032

00074     void setStats(int h, int hmax, int m, int mmax, int s, int smax)
00075     {
00076       health->setProgressRange(hmax);
00077       health->setProgressPosition(h);
00078       magicka->setProgressRange(mmax);
00079       magicka->setProgressPosition(m);
00080       stamina->setProgressRange(smax);
00081       stamina->setProgressPosition(s);
00082     }
00083

00085     { weapImage->setImageTexture(str); }
00086     void setSpellIcon(const char *str)
00087     { spellImage->setImageTexture(str); }

00092       weapStatus->setProgressPosition(s);
00093     }

00103     void setValue (const std::string& id, const MWMechanics::DynamicStat<int>& value)
00104     {
00105         static const char *ids[] =
00106         {
00107             "HBar", "MBar", "FBar",
00108             0
00109         };
00110 
00111         for (int i=0; ids[i]; ++i)
00112             if (ids[i]==id)
00113             {
00114                 switch (i)
00115                 {
00116                     case 0:
00117 
00118                       health->setProgressRange (value.getModified());
00119                       health->setProgressPosition (value.getCurrent());
00120                       break;
00121 
00122                     case 1:
00123 
00124                       magicka->setProgressRange (value.getModified());
00125                       magicka->setProgressPosition (value.getCurrent());
00126                       break;
00127 
00128                     case 2:
00129 
00130                       stamina->setProgressRange (value.getModified());
00131                       stamina->setProgressPosition (value.getCurrent());
00132                       break;
00133                 }
00134             }
00135     }
00136 
00137     MyGUI::ProgressPtr health, magicka, stamina;
00138 
00139     MyGUI::StaticImagePtr weapImage, spellImage;
00140     MyGUI::ProgressPtr weapStatus, spellStatus;
00141

00143     MyGUI::StaticImagePtr effect1;

00244   class InventoryWindow : public OEngine::GUI::Layout
00245   {
00246   public:
00247     enum CategoryMode
00248       {
00249         CM_All = 0,      // All items
00250         CM_Weapon = 1,   // Only weapons
00251         CM_Apparel = 2,  // Apparel
00252         CM_Magic = 3,    // Magic
00253         CM_Misc = 4      // Misc
00254       };
00255 
00256     InventoryWindow ()
00257       : Layout("openmw_inventory_window_layout.xml")
00258       , categoryMode(CM_All)
00259 
00260       // color should be fetched from skin
00261       , activeColor(0, 0, 1)
00262       , inactiveColor(0.7, 0.7, 0.7)
00263     {
00264       setCoord(0, 200, 600, 400);
00265 
00266       // These are just demo values, you should replace these with
00267       // real calls from outside the class later.
00268 
00269       mMainWidget->setCaption("Glass Frostsword");
00270       setText("EncumbranceBarT", "176/210");
00271 
00272       MyGUI::ProgressPtr pt;
00273       getWidget(pt, "EncumbranceBar");
00274       pt->setProgressRange(210);
00275       pt->setProgressPosition(176);
00276 
00277       MyGUI::WidgetPtr avatar;
00278       getWidget(avatar, "Avatar");
00279 
00280       // Adjust armor rating text to bottom of avatar widget
00281       MyGUI::StaticTextPtr armor_rating;
00282       getWidget(armor_rating, "ArmorRating");
00283       armor_rating->setCaption("Armor: 11");
00284       MyGUI::IntCoord coord = armor_rating->getCoord();
00285       coord.top = avatar->getCoord().height - 4 - coord.height;
00286       armor_rating->setCoord(coord);
00287 
00288       names[0] = "All";
00289       names[1] = "Weapon";
00290       names[2] = "Apparel";
00291       names[3] = "Magic";
00292       names[4] = "Misc";
00293 
00294       boost::array<CategoryMode, 5> categories = { {
00295         CM_All, CM_Weapon, CM_Apparel, CM_Magic, CM_Misc
00296       } };
00297 
00298       // Initialize buttons with text and adjust sizes, also mark All as active button
00299       int margin = 2;
00300       int last_x = 0;
00301       for (int i = 0; i < categories.size(); ++i)
00302       {
00303           CategoryMode mode = categories[i];
00304           std::string name = names[mode];
00305           name += "Button";
00306           setText(name, names[mode]);
00307           getWidget(buttons[mode], name);
00308 
00309           MyGUI::ButtonPtr &button_pt = buttons[mode];
00310           if (mode == CM_All)
00311               button_pt->setTextColour(activeColor);
00312           else
00313               button_pt->setTextColour(inactiveColor);
00314           MyGUI::IntCoord coord = button_pt->getCoord();
00315           coord.left = last_x;
00316           last_x += coord.width + margin;
00317           button_pt->setCoord(coord);
00318 
00319           button_pt->eventMouseButtonClick = MyGUI::newDelegate(this, &InventoryWindow::onCategorySelected);
00320       }
00321     }
00322 
00323     void setCategory(CategoryMode mode)
00324     {
00325         MyGUI::ButtonPtr pt = getCategoryButton(categoryMode);
00326         pt->setTextColour(inactiveColor);
00327 
00328         pt = getCategoryButton(mode);
00329         pt->setTextColour(activeColor);
00330         categoryMode = mode;
00331     }
00332 
00333     MyGUI::ButtonPtr getCategoryButton(CategoryMode mode)
00334     {
00335         return buttons[mode];
00336     }
00337 
00338     void onCategorySelected(MyGUI::Widget *widget)
00339     {
00340         boost::array<CategoryMode, 5> categories = { {
00341         CM_All, CM_Weapon, CM_Apparel, CM_Magic, CM_Misc
00342         } };
00343 
00344         for (int i = 0; i < categories.size(); ++i)
00345         {
00346             CategoryMode mode = categories[i];
00347             if (widget == buttons[mode])
00348             {
00349                 setCategory(mode);
00350                 return;
00351             }
00352         }
00353     }
00354 
00355     CategoryMode categoryMode;        // Current category filter
00356     MyGUI::ButtonPtr buttons[5];    // Button pointers
00357     std::string names[5];            // Names of category buttons
00358 
00359     MyGUI::Colour activeColor;
00360     MyGUI::Colour inactiveColor;
00361   };
